source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a dramatic time-lapse from the bow of a large container ship sailing on the open ocean. The foreground is filled with stacks of colorful shipping containers, while the vast sea stretches out to the horizon. Above, a wide expanse of clouds moves rapidly across the sky, with the sun appearing as a bright, hazy orb.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video presents a dramatic time-lapse from the bow of a large container ship sailing on the open ocean. The foreground is filled with stacks of colorful shipping containers, while the vast sea stretches out to the horizon. Above, a wide expanse of clouds moves rapidly across the sky, with the sun appearing as a bright, hazy orb.

generated_critique: The caption includes the subjective adjective "dramatic," which should be removed. It also dedicates a sentence to describing the static scene ("The foreground is filled with stacks of colorful shipping containers, while the vast sea stretches out to the horizon"), which is unnecessary as the instructions require focusing on motion. The description of the cloud movement as "moves rapidly" is correct but could be more specific. The caption should be revised to focus solely on the motion of the clouds in the time-lapse.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This time-lapse, captured from the bow of a container ship, shows a wide expanse of clouds swirling and flowing across the sky over the open ocean. The sun is visible as a bright, hazy orb through the shifting cloud cover.
